name: TrÃ©bol
headline: Business onboarding automation for banks and lenders in Latin America
description: Trebol saves business' banks and lenders from parsing thousands of documents. With an API and tools for developers and legal ops teams TrÃ©bol helps onboard businesses in minutes instead of weeks.

founders.name: Fabian Torres, Founder
founders.description: Before TrÃ©bol, I led product a product team for a fintech co. I started my career in finance doing investments in Latam.

founders.name: Luis Sebastian Buitrago LeÃ³n, Founder
founders.description: Early employee @Lernico, a seed-stage ed-tech company. CFO for two family-owned businesses operating in healthcare services and real estate. Managed the construction of commercial real estate of >5,000 square meters. Optimized capital structure of the business group. Revamped accounting and controlling processes. Data analyst at the largest colombian pension fund where executed capital on real estate assets from $25M to $150M+.

##### Consultar información
Consulta información en fuentes públicas y oficiales de las empresas que estás analizando.
[Consulta nombres, representantes legales, y direcciones.](https://gotrebol.com/</productos/datos-de-empresas>)
##### Valida el expediente del prospecto
Identifica en segundos si los prospectos te están enviando los documentos correctos
[Asegurate de tener el documento completo](https://gotrebol.com/</productos/automatizacion-de-documentos>)
##### Dictamen legal de empresas
[Valida las facultades del representante legal, y valida su información de identidad](https://gotrebol.com/</productos/automatizacion-de-documentos>)
Conoce los propietarios reales y valida los estatutos de la empresa
##### Automatiza tu onboarding
[Exporta los datos al contrato que vas a firmar o formatos.](https://gotrebol.com/</productos/automatizacion-de-documentos>)
Consulta a los propietarios reales y a la empresa en listas de sanciones.
## Digitaliza el onboarding de empresas‍ y cumple con regulación con Trébol
## Resultados para bancos y financieras con Trébol
##### Mejora tu tasa de conversión de clientes
Prevalida los documentos que te envían tus clientes en segundos.
Consulta información de la empresa y los apoderados para llenar los formularios de onboarding
##### Acelera el tiempo de onboarding
En solo minutos tienes el expediente prevalidado y el dictamen legal de la empresa
En minutos alistas los contratos para la firma
Agrega fuentes de información y contrástalas.
##### Cumple con regulación de PLD y SARLAFT
Prepara reportes para cumplir con requerimientos de prevención de lavado de dinero.
Consulta la información de tus clientes en cualquier momento.
Automatiza el conocimiento de beneficiarios finales y de actividades de los negocios.

generated_description:
**Trébol: Revolutionizing Business Onboarding in Latin America**

Founded in 2021 and proudly a part of Y Combinator's W22 batch, Trébol is a Colombian fintech startup that specializes in automating the onboarding process for banks and lenders across Latin America. The company’s mission is straightforward yet impactful: to streamline and modernize the way financial institutions onboard businesses, cutting down what used to be weeks of paperwork into mere minutes.

### What They Do

Trébol initially emerged to tackle the significant pain points for banks and lenders—namely, the exhaustive task of parsing through thousands of documents. With its robust API, the company provides essential tools for developers and legal operations teams, facilitating the onboarding process in a seamless manner. The end result is a faster, more efficient method that not only enhances the user experience but also improves compliance with regulatory demands.

**Key Offerings:**
- **Document Automation:** Streamlines the handling of various business documents.
- **Business Data Verification:** Helps users verify legal representatives and stakeholders in real-time.
- **Legal Opinions on Companies:** Validates the legal standing of businesses, ensuring accurate documentation.

Trébol is positioned perfectly within the fast-growing sectors of fintech, SaaS, B2B, and enterprise solutions, making it a compelling choice for financial institutions looking to innovate and stay competitive.

### The Team

Operating out of Bogotá with a lean team of seven, Trébol is nimble and poised to adapt quickly to the changing landscape of business finance in the region. Under the guidance of their group partner, Aaron Epstein, the team is dedicated to refining their services and expanding their reach.

### The Impact 

Trébol has already attracted notable clients such as Iris Bank, Finaktiva, Clara, and Jeeves, who leverage the platform to enhance their own onboarding processes. By enabling quicker approvals and better documentation verification, Trébol is helping its clients improve conversion rates and comply with anti-money laundering regulations.

### Why It Matters

In an era where speed and efficiency are crucial, Trébol is not just about saving time; it’s about reshaping the future of business interactions in finance. The automation of onboarding means fewer hurdles for businesses to clear to access financial services, which could stimulate growth across entire sectors.

If you're interested in seeing how Trébol can transform your onboarding process, you can visit their website: [gotrebol.com](https://gotrebol.com).

In summary, Trébol embodies the innovative spirit that can be a game changer in LATAM’s fintech space, making onboarding faster, easier, and more compliant. It’s a forward-thinking solution at a time when the industry needs it most.
